model.description: The maximum size during a sampling period of the event intake queue.
model.title: intakeQueue

model.description: The average number of events in the consensus queue (q2) waiting to be handled.
model.title: consEvents

panels.description: The fraction (out of 1.0) of the network that is alive and healthy, weighted by consensus weight.
panels.title: healthyNetworkFraction

panels.description: The number of app transactions added to the hashgraph per second by each node via deduplicated events.
panels.title: trans/sec

panels.description: The average number of app transactions added to the hashgraph per second by the network via deduplicated events.
panels.title: Avg trans/sec

panels.description: The time from creating an event to knowing its consensus (in seconds).
panels.title: secC2C

panels.description: Of the secC2C values reported by each node, the minimum, average, and maximum.
panels.title: secC2C

panels.description: The number of events per second created by each node in the network.
panels.title: cEvents/sec

panels.description: The average number of events per second created by each node.
panels.title: cEvents/sec

panels.description: The average time to handle a consensus transaction in SwirldState.handleTransaction()
panels.title: secTransH

panels.description: The average time it takes to perform preHandle.
panels.title: preHandleMicros

list.description: The network to pull data from (i.e. mainnet, testnet, etc).
list.label: Network
list.name: network
